content: the booty crew materials worsted weight/ size 4 yarn body colors- loops & threads impeccable ~ dark charcoal and classic gray heart wings colors - loops & threads impeccable ~ cherry and soft rose 4 00 mm crochet hook 15mm safety eyes poly-fil stuffing yarn needle embroidery floss - pink sewing thread - black and pink tiny buttons - black circle and heart shaped stitch markers terms magic_ring - magic_ring slp - slip_stitch chain - chain st - stitch round - round row - row single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet increase - increase 2sc in the same stitch invdec - invisible decrease love bug notes invisible decrease - put hook through the front loop of two single_crochet crochet pattern stitches yarn over and pull up loop two loops on hook yarn over and pull through two loops crochetbysarahlouise com crochetbysarahlouise etsy com *this pattern is worked from the top down in a continuous round *use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of the rounds crochetbysarahlouise@gmail com *the booty crew can be made in any size yarn so have fun playing with by sarah townsend different yarn and hook sizes **you may make and sell finished products from this pattern don t forget to credit crochet by sarah louise as the pattern designer please don t copy or post this pattern or photos as your own ** 2023 ©crochetbysarahlouise by sarah townsend page 1 of 3 www crochetbysarahlouise com body for love bug heart wings make 2 body color ~ dark charcoal or classic gray wings color ~ cherry or soft rose rnd1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 rnd1 magic_ring chain 2 9 double_crochet in magic_ring 9 rnd2 increase repeat 6 times 12 rnd2 slp into top of first double_crochet made chain 2 5 double_crochet in same st as chain rnd3 increase 1 single_crochet repeat 6 times 18 2 2 half_double_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet in next st 1 rnd4 increase 2 single_crochet repeat 6 times 24 single_crochet in the next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st 5 double_crochet in next st chain 2 and rnd5 increase 3 single_crochet repeat 6 times 30 slp at the bottom of the first chain 2 made at the begging of round 2 rnd6 - 12 1 single_crochet in every st around 30 23 rnd13 invdec 3 single_crochet repeat 6 times 24 fasten_off and leave tail for sewing sew buttons to wings with place eyes between rounds 8 and 9 5-6 st apart thread pin the points of the wings together on the back of rnd14 invdec repeat 12 times 12 love bug sew into place begin stuffing rnd15 invdec repeat 6 times 6 fasten_off leave a long tail for closing hole and shaping booty close hole by sewing into front loops only with tail pull tight making the booty using the same tail insert needle through center hole at rnd15 and bring out center back at rnd9 make line
